media.headline: Hernandez's leadoff home run
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Hernandez goes deep to start the game
media.bigblurb: Cesar Hernandez smashes a leadoff home run off Scott Feldman to get the Phillies on the board in the top of the 1st inning

media.headline: Saunders' RBI double to left
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Saunders knocks in Franco with an RBI double
media.bigblurb: Michael Saunders hammers a ball off of the left-center wall for an RBI double that scores Maikel Franco from first base

media.headline: Galvis touches them all
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Galvis blasts a solo shot to right-center
media.bigblurb: Freddy Galvis sends a ball over the right-center field wall for a solo home run that puts the Phillies up 3-0 in the 2nd inning

media.headline: Barnhart nabs Kendrick at second
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Barnhart catches Kendrick stealing second
media.bigblurb: Howie Kendrick attempts to swipe second base, but Tucker Barnhart throws down and cuts off the attempt for the second out of the inning

media.headline: Hamilton gets Reds on the board
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Hamilton brings home Cozart on sac fly
media.bigblurb: Billy Hamilton lifts a fly ball to right field which allows Zack Cozart to tag up from third and score, putting the Reds within two

media.headline: Feldman K's Joseph
media.bigblurb: Scott Feldman forces Tommy Joseph to strike out swinging for the third out of the inning

media.headline: Galvis touches them all
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Galvis blasts a solo shot to right-center
media.bigblurb: Freddy Galvis sends a ball over the right-center field wall for a solo home run that puts the Phillies up 3-0 in the 2nd inning

media.headline: Astin escapes bases-loaded jam
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Astin gets out of jam during MLB debut
media.bigblurb: Barrett Astin escapes trouble in his Major League debut after forcing Michael Saunders to ground out to first base with the bases loaded

media.headline: Phillies starters introduced
media.bigblurb: The Phillies' starting lineup is introduced before taking on the Reds on Opening Day in Cincinnati

media.headline: Hellickson smacks an RBI triple
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Hellickson drives in Galvis on an RBI triple
media.bigblurb: Jeremy Hellickson ropes a liner down the right-field line that brings home Freddy Galvis for an RBI triple during the top of the 6th inning

media.headline: Reds starters introduced
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Reds starters introduced at Great American
media.bigblurb: The Reds starting lineup is introduced before hosting the Phillies on Opening Day at Great American Ball Park

media.headline: VanHoose sings national anthem
media.bigblurb: Marlana VanHoose sings the national anthem before the Reds host the Phillies on Opening Day at Great American Ball Park

media.headline: The Mayor becomes the Marshal
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Casey on being Opening Day Grand Marshal
media.bigblurb: Sean Casey talks about being the Grand Marshal for Opening Day in Cincinnati and how he still connects with the city

media.headline: Joseph's unassisted double play
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Joseph doubles up Barnhart with diving play
media.bigblurb: Scooter Gennett lines a ball to the right side, but Tommy Joseph snares it then dives backwards and tags Tucker Barnhart for the double play

media.headline: Feldman begins season
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Feldman delivers the first pitch for Reds
media.bigblurb: Scott Feldman throws a strike to Cesar Hernandez for the first pitch on Opening Day at Great American Ball Park

media.headline: Gennett's two-run dinger
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Gennett goes deep to put the Reds within one
media.bigblurb: With two outs in the bottom of the 9th, Scooter Gennett hits a two-run blast over the left-field wall to put the Reds within one, 4-3

media.headline: Gennett on first game with Reds
media.blurb: PHI@CIN: Gennett discusses his first game with Reds
media.bigblurb: Scooter Gennett talks about his first game with the Reds, and having his first home run of the season under his belt

media.headline: Recap: PHI 4, CIN 3
media.blurb: 4/3/17: Hellickson leads Phillies to Opening Day win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Cesar Hernandez hit a leadoff homer, while Jeremy Hellickson allowed one run through five innings and tallied an RBI triple
